ticketPanelEmbed.title: 🎫 Support Ticket System
ticketPanelEmbed.description:
Need help? Click the button below to create a support ticket!

**How it works:**
• Click 'Create Ticket'
• Select your issue category
• A private channel will be created
• Our staff will assist you shortly

⏰ Average response time: < 1 hour
ticketPanelEmbed.footer: Click the button below to get started!
